name: Software Brothers
description:
We bring together top industry experts and boast more than 10 years of experience in developing IT solutions. We have delivered our systems to 17 countries on 5 continents and today millions of people use them all over the world. 
As Software Brothers, we will provide you a comprehensive solution, not just a dry programming code. In practice, this means that we will support you from the idea to the implementation of a ready product to the market. 
We want you to feel like a partner, not a client.
Technology
We deliver software for all platforms: web, mobile and desktop. We specialize in JavaScript (backend: Node.js, frontend: Vue.js, Angular, React, Electron and React Native for mobile devices) - we believe that JS is the best technology to deliver reliable and functional products. 
Experience
We have a vast experience in developing software and UX/UI design for clients from all over the world - USA, UK, Australia, Germany, Indonesia, Norway, UAE and more. Head over to our portfolio to see our reviews!
Knowledge
By working with us, you gain access to experts, the latest technological knowledge and industry know-how. As an organization we have developed effective production processes and work-flow over the years.
